input_type.script:
#!/usr/bin/python
''' An Extension Attribute that uses Munki's core tools to compare the installed version of an application with the last version installed by Jamf '''
import os
versioner_path = '/usr/local/munki/versioner' output = "False" if os.path.isdir(versioner_path): output = "True"
# write out EA print "<result>{}</result>".format(output)
